description.short: Find the xth positive narcissistic number.
description.full: Recreational mathematicians have identified a type of number called a [narcissistic number](http://mathworld.wolfram.com/NarcissisticNumber.html), which isn't particularly useful but is a true hit at dinner parties. Never one to be outdone, you realize it may be wise to have a narcissist number finder function in your bag of tricks. Write a function that accepts one number (x) and returns the xth positive narcissistic number.
